app_descript:
Brief:

Solomon's Boneyard is an immersive magical action game where players step into the shoes of a powerful wizard, battling against endless waves of the undead in the eerie surrounds of Solomon's graveyard. Using a variety of spells and abilities, players must fend off skeletons and other ghoulish creatures, while collecting coins and power-ups to strengthen their character and set new high scores.
